person.persName: John Carter Ball (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Julina W. Ball. Father of Susan Ball, John Ball, Rebecca Ball, Elizabeth Ball, Henry Ball, Sarah "Sally" Ball, Thomas Ball, Robert C. Ball, James Ball, George Ball, and Alice Ball. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Employed Edwin Colegrove as a laborer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a quarter-master from July 3, 1863 to March 20, 1864.
